quagga.input.subject: Re: HPL v. Shanghai
quagga.input.body:
----- Forwarded by Richard B Sanders/HOU/ECT on 12/18/2000 02:23 PM -----

	Britt Davis@ENRON
	12/18/2000 01:43 PM
		
		 To: Cheryl Marshall/HOU/ECT@ECT
		 cc: Steve HPL Schneider/HOU/ECT@ECT, Ann Elizabeth White/HOU/ECT@ECT, 
Richard B Sanders/HOU/ECT@ECT, Linda R Guinn/HOU/ECT@ECT, Becky 
Zikes/Corp/Enron@ENRON
		 Subject: Re: HPL v. Shanghai

Done.  It will go out tonight by Federal Express and to Shanghai and its 
attorneys by messenger today.  I believe that I've blind-copied everybody on 
this.

I will continue to keep you advised.

Britt



	Cheryl Marshall@ECT
	12/18/2000 12:58 PM
		
		 To: Britt Davis/Corp/Enron@ENRON
		 cc: 
		 Subject: Re: HPL v. Shanghai

You have the number right!  Please see the attached Excel spreadsheet for 
more detailed information on payments made.  Please proceed with sending out 
the arbitration form.  Thanks!
